backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Describes two frontend features adding dance-themed backgrounds and generated assets, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains brief summaries for three frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, and tailwind.config.js.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base variables and dark mode values, applying color and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React UI for selecting dance styles, applying a themed background and showing contextual info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with query invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with OKLCH theme tokens and a dance-themed-background utility referencing a static image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, fonts, and animations using CSS variable-based OKLCH tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, required features, and image needs for a dance-themed app with dropdown selection, photo upload, gallery display, and background styling.
